thread.title: Cougar Global Investments Appoints Abe Sheikh as Co-Chief Investment Officer and Portfolio Manager

author: cnbc.com
title: Cougar Global Investments Appoints Abe Sheikh as Co-Chief Investment Officer and Portfolio Manager
text:
TORONTO and ST. PETERSBURG, Fla., March 5, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Cougar Global Investments, a globally-oriented macro ETF strategist and affiliate of Carillon Tower Advisers, is pleased to announce that Abdullah "Abe" Sheikh, FSA, MAAA, has been named co-chief investment officer and portfolio manager.
In his new role as co-CIO and portfolio manager, Mr. Sheikh will work alongside Dr. James Breech, president and CEO, CIO of Cougar Global, to manage portfolios and provide clients with long-term compound growth through the firm's tactical global asset-allocation strategies and portfolio-construction methodology. He joined the firm in 2017 as head of research, bringing more than 15 years of investment experience and a background that complements the investment process at Cougar Global.
"Abe's expertise in developing enhanced analytics and quantitative-research capabilities have proven to be a terrific addition to our investment approach," said Dr. Breech. "We applaud Abe for his immediate contributions to the research methods of our investment team and have deep faith in his abilities as he takes on additional portfolio-management responsibilities."
"I am honored by the opportunity as co-CIO to work closely with such a highly respected tactical strategist and capital-markets expert as Dr. Breech. I look forward to continuing to work with the firm's outstanding team of portfolio managers to construct portfolios that protect principal while generating growth at a time when clients are increasingly concerned about downside risk," added Mr. Sheikh.
Mr. Sheikh has extensive experience in global strategic and tactical asset allocation. He previously worked for 11 years as vice president of capital-markets research and portfolio management as well as director of quantitative research at J.P. Morgan Asset Management. Prior to joining J.P. Morgan Asset Management, he was an analyst for four years at Watson Wyatt Worldwide. Mr. Sheikh earned a bachelor's degree in actuarial science from the London School of Economics and Political Science and a master's degree in computational finance from Carnegie Mellon University. He is a fellow of the Society of Actuaries (FSA) and a member of the American Academy of Actuaries (MAAA).
"We are excited to welcome Abe into his new role at Cougar Global," said Cooper Abbott, CFA, president of Carillon Tower. "His talent as a quantitative researcher and his passion for the development of investable ideas will be instrumental in helping clients achieve their specific investment goals, and a driver for Cougar Global's continued growth."
About Cougar Global Investments Ltd.
Founded in 1993, Cougar Global is a globally oriented macro asset-allocation strategist and portfolio manager that provides its investment services to advisors, advisory platforms, high-net-worth individuals, families, foundations, trusts and institutions in Canada and the United States. The firm employs a disciplined portfolio-construction methodology that combines macroeconomic analysis with downside-risk management. The firm's guiding philosophy seeks to provide clients with long-term compound growth, primarily achieved by minimizing loss. CougarGlobal.com .
About Carillon Tower Advisers, Inc.
Carillon Tower Advisers is a global asset-management company that combines the exceptional insight and agility of individual investment teams with the strength and stability of a full-service firm. Together with our partner affiliates – ClariVest Asset Management, Cougar Global Investments, Eagle Asset Management, Reams Asset Management (a division of Scout Investments) and Scout Investments – we offer a range of investment strategies and asset classes through a number of vehicles, each with a focus on risk-adjusted returns and alpha generation. We believe this lineup of institutional-class portfolio managers can help investors meet their long-term business and financial goals. Ultimately, our structure allows affiliated investment teams to focus on what they do best: managing portfolios. CarillonTower.com .
